description:
A premium travel pack for European tours and RTW adventures. The Porter 65's comfortable backpack suspension system makes it easy to shoulder your load for the walk to the train station, and it zips away behind a panel when it's time to check your bag. A massive U-shaped zipper opens the main compartment like a suitcase for easy packing and unpacking, and burly compression straps streamline the load if you've gone a little overboard on the souvenirs. The dedicated, padded laptop sleeve makes it easy to grab your laptop at airport security or once you reach your seat, and lockable zippers keep your gear safe.

  • Stowaway harness and hipbelt zip behind a panel for protection when you check your bag
  • Foam-padded shoulder straps and hipbelt have soft, breathable contact surfaces
  • Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry in suitcase mode. Tuckaway loops let you attach a shoulder strap (sold separately)
  • Large U-shaped zippered opening provides easy access to the main compartment
  • Large lower zippered compartment provides additional organization for shoes and or dirty laundry
  • Structural sidewalls hold your bag open, making it easy to pack and unload
  • Padded sleeve holds a 16in. laptop and tablet for quick access at security
  • Lots of interior and exterior pockets keep you organized
  • StraightJacket™ compression system with padded wings and lower panel secures and protects your gear
  • Main compartment and laptop sleeve have lockable zippers
name: Osprey Porter 65 Travel Pack - Unisex
